card.name: Baby Unicorn (Pink)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Orange)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Yellow)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Green)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Blue)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Purple)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Black)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (White)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Brown)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Rainbow)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Death)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Narwhal
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Red)
card.text: Beards are like, so hot.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Orange)
card.text: Pumpkin spice is the pumpkin spice of life.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Yellow)
card.text: Dance like nobody's watching.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Green)
card.text: Vinyl records and mixtapes only.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Blue)
card.text: Popped collars are for date nights only.

card.name: Basic Unicorn (Purple)
card.text: #nomakeup #nofilter #sunnies #shameless #selfie #basic #TGIF #unicornhairdontcare

card.name: Narwhall
card.text: This card has no special powers, but it sure is cute!

card.name: Rhinocorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card. If you do, immediately skip to your End of Turn phase.

card.name: Extremely Fertile Unicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable.

card.name: Magical Kittencorn
card.text: This card cannot be destroyed or otherwise affected by Magic cards.

card.name: Stabby The Unicorn
card.text: If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card.

card.name: Puppicorn
card.text: Each time any player begins their turn, move this card to that player's Stable. This card cannot be sacrificed or destroyed.

card.name: Rainbow Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may bring a Basic Unicorn card from your hand directly into your Stable.

card.name: Zombie Unicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a Unicorn card. If you do, choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and bring it directly into your Stable, then immediately skip to your End of Turn phase.

card.name: Extremely Destructive Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must SACRIFICE a Unicorn card.

card.name: Chainsaw Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may SACRIFICE or DESTROY an Upgrade or Downgrade card.

card.name: Llamacorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must DISCARD a card. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.

card.name: Americorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any player. Pull a card from that player's hand.

card.name: Ginormous Unicorn
card.text: This card counts for 2 Unicorns. You cannot play any Instant cards.

card.name: Seductive Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, STEAL a Unicorn card. If this card leaves your Stable, return that Unicorn card to the Stable from which you stole it.

card.name: Angel Unicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: Queen Bee Unicorn
card.text: Basic Unicorn cards cannot enter any other player's Stable.

card.name: Greedy Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DRAW a card. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Annoying Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose any player. That player must DISCARD a card. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Magical Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose a Magic card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Swift Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose an Instant card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Majestic Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Unicorn Phoenix
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, bring it directly back into your Stable if you have at least 1 card in your hand.

card.name: Unicorn On The Cob
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DRAW 2 cards and DISCARD a card.

card.name: Black Knight Unicorn
card.text: If 1 of your Unicorn cards would be destroyed, you may SACRIFICE this card instead.

card.name: Shark With A Horn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, DESTROY a Unicorn card.

card.name: Shabby The Narwhal
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for a Downgrade card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Narwhal Torpedo
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE all Downgrade cards.

card.name: Alluring Narwhal
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may STEAL an Upgrade card.

card.name: Mermaid Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose any player. Return a card in that player's Stable to their hand.

card.name: Classy Narwhal
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for an Upgrade card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: The Great Narwhal
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for a card with "Narwhal" in its name and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Unicorn Poison
card.text: DESTROY a Unicorn card.

card.name: Back Kick
card.text: Choose any player. Return a card in that player's Stable to their hand. That player must DISCARD a card.

card.name: Change Of Luck
card.text: DRAW 2 cards and DISCARD 3 cards, then take another turn.

card.name: Glitter Tornado
card.text: Return a card in each player's Stable to that player's hand.

card.name: Unicorn Swap
card.text: Move a Unicorn card in your Stable to any other player's Stable, then STEAL a Unicorn card from that player's Stable.

card.name: Re-Target
card.text: Move an Upgrade or Downgrade card from any player's Stable to any other player's Stable.

card.name: Unfair Bargain
card.text: Trade hands with any other player.

card.name: Two-For-One
card.text: SACRIFICE a card, then DESTROY 2 cards.

card.name: Unicorn Shrinkray
card.text: Choose any player. Move all of that player's Unicorn cards to the discard pile without triggering any of their effects, then bring the same number of Baby Unicorn cards from the Nursery directly into that player's Stable.

card.name: Targeted Destruction
card.text: SACRIFICE or DESTROY an Upgrade or Downgrade card.

card.name: Mystical Vortex
card.text: Each player must DISCARD a card. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.

card.name: Good Deal
card.text: DRAW 3 cards and DISCARD a card.

card.name: Shake Up
card.text: Shuffle this card, your hand, and the discard pile into the deck. DRAW 5 cards.

card.name: Blatant Thieveryy
card.text: Choose any player and look at that player's hand. Choose a card from that player's hand and add it to your hand.

card.name: Reset Button
card.text: Each player must SACRIFICE all Upgrade and Downgrade cards. Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.

card.name: Rainbow Mane
card.text: This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn card in that Stable. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Basic Unicorn card from your hand directly into your Stable.

card.name: Extra Tail
card.text: This card can only enter a Stable if there is a Basic Unicorn card in that Stable. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card.

card.name: Glitter Bomb
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a card. If you do, DESTROY a card.

card.name: Yay
card.text: Cards you play cannot be Neigh'd.

card.name: Unicorn Lasso
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may STEAL a Unicorn card. At the end of your turn, return that Unicorn card to the Stable from which you stole it.

card.name: Rainbow Aura
card.text: Your Unicorn cards cannot be destroyed.

card.name: Double Dutch
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may play 2 cards during your Action phase.

card.name: Summoning Ritual
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 Unicorn cards. If you do, bring a Unicorn card directly from the discard pile into your Stable.

card.name: Barbed Wiree
card.text: Each time a Unicorn card enters or leaves your stable, DISCARD a card.

card.name: Pandamonium
card.text: All of your Unicorns are considered Pandas. Cards that affect Unicorn cards do not affect your Pandas.

card.name: Sadistic Ritual
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card, then DRAW a card.

card.name: Slowdown
card.text: You cannot play Instant cards.

card.name: Nanny Cam
card.text: Your hand must be visible to all players at all times.

card.name: Broken Stable
card.text: You cannot play Upgrade cards.

card.name: Blinding Lightt
card.text: Triggered effects of your Unicorn cards do not activate.

card.name: Tiny Stable
card.text: If at any time you have more than 5 Unicorns in your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Super Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile. This card cannot be Neigh'd.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Sparkles)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Flowers)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Horse With An Ice Cream Cone
card.text: Ice cream always saves the day!

card.name: Innocent Bunnicorn
card.text: Look, Mom! I'm a unicorn!

card.name: Glitter Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may bring an Upgrade card from your hand directly into your Stable.

card.name: Unicorn Rainbow Princess
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any number of players. DRAW cards equal to the number of chosen players. Each of those players may DRAW a card.

card.name: Cotton Candy Llamacorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must SACRIFICE a Unicorn card, then DRAW a card.

card.name: The Tiniest Unicorn
card.text: This card cannot be destroyed by triggered card effects.

card.name: Adorable Flying Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must SACRIFICE a card. If this card would be sacrificed or destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: A Cute Attack
card.text: Choose any player. Move up to 3 Unicorn cards from that player's Stable to the discard pile without triggering any of their effects, then bring the same number of Baby Unicorn cards from the Nursery directly into that player's Stable.

card.name: Unicorn Nap
card.text: Choose any player. That player must skip their next turn.

card.name: Tiny Hooves
card.text: Your hand limit is 3 cards.

card.name: Cupcakes For Everyone
card.text: All of your Upgrade cards affect each player's Stable.

card.name: Rainbow Sprinkles
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW 3 cards. If you do, immediately skip to your End of Turn phase.

card.name: Special Delivery
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable. If you do, skip your Action phase.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Unicorn Of Death
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If you do, DESTROY a Unicorn card.

card.name: Unicorn Of Pestilence
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must DISCARD their hand.

card.name: Unicorn Of War
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any number of players. DESTROY a Unicorn card in each of their Stables. Each of the chosen players may then DESTROY a Unicorn card in your Stable.

card.name: Unicorn Of Famine
card.text: Each player has a hand limit of 2 cards.

card.name: Heavenly Smite
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Angel Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Overpopulation
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Extremely Fertile Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Plague Of Death
card.text: SACRIFICE any number of cards, then DESTROY the same number of cards.

card.name: Storm Of Cuteness
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Kittencorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Fire And Brimstonee
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Unicorn Phoenix" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Zombie Apocalypsee
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Zombie Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Llamapocalypse
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for a "Llamacorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Ultimate Destruction
card.text: SACRIFICE all of your Unicorn cards, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each other player's Stable. Search the deck for an "Extremely Destructive Unicorn" card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Unicorn With a Dragon Tattoo
card.text: At least it's not a lower back tattoo...

card.name: Dragon Cosplay Unicorn
card.text: It's not a costume. It's a way of life.

card.name: Dragon Slayer Unicorn
card.text: As long as this card is in your Stable, your Unicorns cannot be destroyed or affected by any card with "Dragon" in its name.

card.name: Dragon Tamer Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may search the deck for a card with "Dragon" in its name. Add it to your hand, then shuffle the deck.

card.name: Dragon Rider Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move an UPGRADE or DOWNGRADE card from any player's Stable to another player's Stable.

card.name: Dragon Unicorn
card.text: If this card leaves your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn.

card.name: Dragon-Scorched Stables
card.text: Each player must SACRIFICE all Upgrade and Downgrade cards.

card.name: Dragon Kiss
card.text: Search the deck for a Magic card. Play it immediately, then shuffle the deck.

card.name: Dragon Skies
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you must shuffle a Unicorn from your stable into the deck, then DRAW an extra card.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Grenade)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Upside Down)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Unicorn (Snake)
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Nightmare Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 3 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a Unicorn card from the discard pile and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: Epic Level Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards. Each time you DESTROY a card, you may DESTROY a second card.

card.name: Frankencorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. When any other player tries to play a card, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, add that card to your hand instead, then immediately play it.

card.name: Puppetmaster Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. Each time you DISCARD a card, you may choose up to 2 other players. Each of those players must also DISCARD a card.

card.name: Shadow Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. When a Unicorn card in any other player's Stable would be sacrificed or returned to a player's hand, you may DISCARD up to 2 cards. If you DISCARD 1 card, add that card to your hand instead. If you DISCARD 2 cards, bring that card directly into your Stable.

card.name: The Reaper Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade card in your Stable, then DESTROY 2 Unicorn cards.

card.name: Unicorn Of Foreboding Doom
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. When any player plays an Upgrade card in their Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, search the deck for a Downgrade card and bring it directly into that player's Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Unicorn Of Misfortune
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, each other player must DISCARD a card.

card.name: Valkyrie Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If you do, bring a Unicorn card from the discard pile directly into your Stable.

card.name: Manticore Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. If you do, skip your Draw phase.

card.name: Archangel Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 3 cards, if a card in your Stable would be sacrificed or destroyed, you may DISCARD a card instead. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW and extra card.

card.name: Chronocorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. This card can be played as an instant card.

card.name: Elusive Oceloticorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards. No other player may play Neigh cards. This card cannot be Neigh'd.

card.name: Game Master Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD your hand. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card. Your hand limit increases by 3 cards.

card.name: Nine-Tailed Foxicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 Unicorn cards, then search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck. If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, you may search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: The Rad Scientist Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a card. If a card in your Stable would be destroyed, you may DISCARD 2 cards instead.

card.name: Unicorn Of Conniving Artistry
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE a Unicorn card. If one of your Unicorn cards would be destroyed, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade or Downgrade card instead.

card.name: Unicorn Of Glory
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, DISCARD a card. When any other player plays a Downgrade card in your Stable, search the deck for an Upgrade card and bring it directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Time-Shifting Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE 2 cards. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck, then return them in any order.

card.name: Sniper Unicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DESTROY a Upgrade card. If you do, skip your Action Phase.

card.name: Unicorn Of Betrayal
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card. If this card would be destroyed by any other player's card, that player may STEAL it instead.

card.name: Kittencorn Burglar
card.text: DISCARD a card, then search the discard pile for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: Absorb And Reflect
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a Magic card. Stop that card from being played and add it to your hand, then immediately play it.

card.name: Intervention
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to SACRIFICE a card. Stop the sacrifice effect and choose any player. SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card in that player's Stable.

card.name: Redirect
card.text: Play this card when an effect would DESTROY a Unicorn card. Choose the target of that destruction effect.

card.name: Trapped Chest
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to DRAW a card. Stop that player from drawing the card. That player must DISCARD a card instead.

card.name: Nightmare Pact
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, name a type of card. If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a card of that type from the discard pile directly into your Stable, then immediately end your turn.

card.name: Hypnocorn
card.text: When any other player tries to trigger a Unicorn card effect, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, stop that effect from triggering.

card.name: Unicorn Of Charity
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DRAW an extra card. If you do, each other player may DRAW a card.

card.name: Rainbow Bridge
card.text: DRAW a card. If it's an Upgrade, Downgrade, or Unicorn card, bring that card directly into your Stable, then DRAW another card.

card.name: Bulletproof Vest
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to DESTROY a card in your Stable. Stop the destruction effect and DRAW a card instead.

card.name: Destabilize
card.text: Play this card with any other player tries to play an Upgrade or Downgrade card. Choose the Stable that card enters.

card.name: Imitation
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a Unicorn card. Bring a Basic Unicorn card from your hand directly into your Stable.

card.name: Unwind And Rewind
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that card from coming into play, then add it to the top of the deck.

card.name: Unicorn Bribe
card.text: If one of your Unicorn cards would be sacrificed or destroyed, you may SACRIFICE an Upgrade or Downgrade card instead.

card.name: Unicorn Tax
card.text: Each time you DRAW a least 1 card, DISCARD a card.

card.name: Angelic Baby Unicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Archangel Unicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Bearicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Belugacorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Nightmare Unicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Pegacorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Penguincorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Baby Slothicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Demonic Baby Unicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Million Dollar Baby Unicorn
card.text: If this card would be sacrificed, destroyed, or returned to your hand, return it to the Nursery instead.

card.name: Corn On The Cob
card.text: Insert corny pun here.

card.name: Raccoonicorn
card.text: One Unicorn's trash is another Raccoonicorns's hat.

card.name: Red Pandacorn
card.text: "I'm not a fox, I just look foxy!"

card.name: Suburban Dadicorn
card.text: "Hi, hungry! I'm Dad!"

card.name: Tech Supporticorn
card.text: "Have you tried turning it off and then on again?"

card.name: Unicorn Tourist
card.text: "We're not lost! We're on an adventure!"

card.name: Weeniecorn
card.text: Hold the relish!

card.name: Academicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move an Upgrade card from your Stable to any other player's Stable. If you do, STEAL an Upgrade card from that player's Stable.

card.name: Alchemist Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose any player. DESTROY a Unicorn card in that player's Stable, then search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into that player's Stable.

card.name: Dread Pirate Unicorn
card.text: Each time a player would DISCARD a card, that player must DISCARD 2 cards instead.

card.name: Excited Sealicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring an UPGRADE card from your hand directly into your Stable.

card.name: Fortune Teller Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck. Move any number of those cards to the discard pile, then return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

card.name: Foxicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may choose any player. That player must shuffle their hand into the deck, then DRAW 3 cards.

card.name: Lady Justice Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move a Unicorn card from the Stable with the most Unicorns to the Stable with the fewest Unicorns.

card.name: Mama Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable.

card.name: Mutually Assured Destructicorn
card.text: If this card is sacrificed or destroyed, each player must SACRIFICE a card.

card.name: Nannycorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable. If you do, do not play a card from your hand during your Action phase.

card.name: Nymphicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, each player that does not have a Magical Unicorn card in their Stable must DISCARD a card.

card.name: Parallel Universicorn
card.text: Each time a player would DISCARD a card, that player may DRAW a card instead.

card.name: Patient Zero Unicorn
card.text: Each time a player would SACRIFICE a card, that player must SACRIFICE 2 cards instead.

card.name: Pickpocket Unicorn
card.text: When this card leaves your Stable, you may choose any other player. Pull a card from that player's hand and add it to your hand.

card.name: Pied Pipercorn
card.text: When any other player tries to bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery into their Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring that *Baby Unicorn card directly into your Stable instead.

card.name: Regifting Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may move a Downgrade card from your Stable to any other player's Stable.

card.name: Sacrificial Lambicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may SACRIFICE it. If you do, DISCARD your hand and DRAW 5 cards.

card.name: Slothicorn
card.text: Triggered effects of your Magical Unicorn cards do not activate.

card.name: Spy Unicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, choose any other player. That player must show you their hand.

card.name: Traffic Director Unicorn
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may move an Upgrade or Downgrade card from any player's Stable to any other player's Stable. If you do, skip your Action phase.

card.name: Trojan Unicorn
card.text: When any other player plays a Unicorn card, you may SACRIFICE this card. If you do, STEAL that Unicorn card.

card.name: Twin Unicorns
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, play 2 cards during your Action phase.

card.name: Unicorn Prophet
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 2 cards of the deck and return them in the same order.

card.name: Unicorn Trap Master
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a DOWNGRADE card from your hand directly into any player's Stable.

card.name: Wrecking Ball Unicorn
card.text: This card cannot be Neigh'd.

card.name: Controlled Destruction
card.text: DESTROY a card in any player's Stable without triggering any of it's triggered effects.

card.name: Grow Up
card.text: SACRIFICE a Baby Unicorn card, then search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: Merry-Go-Round
card.text: Each player must pass their hand to the player on their left.

card.name: Prospecting
card.text: Flip one card at a time from the top of the deck into the discard pile until you find a Unicorn card. Bring that card directly into your Stable.

card.name: Quid Pro Quo
card.text: DRAW 4 cards and DISCARD 4 cards.

card.name: Rainbow Bazooka
card.text: Choose any other player, DESTROY a Unicorn card in that player's Stable. You and that player may each DRAW a card.

card.name: Spring Cleaning
card.text: DISCARD any number of cards. Choose a number of players equal to the number of cards you discarded, then DESTROY a Unicorn card in each of their Stables.

card.name: Temporal Paradox
card.text: Return a card in any player's Stable to that player's hand and DRAW a card.

card.name: Time Rift
card.text: Choose any player. Return all cards in that player's Stable to that player's hand, then immediately bring the same cards directly into that player's Stable.

card.name: Totally Not Two Unicorns
card.text: DRAW a card, then play 2 cards from your hand. Skip your next turn.

card.name: Unicorn Black Market
card.text: Choose any other player and look at that player's hand. Choose 2 cards from that player's hand and add them to your hand. That player may look at your hand and choose a card from it to add to their hand. That player may not choose either card you chose.

card.name: Unicorn Trap
card.text: STEAL a Unicorn card.

card.name: Unicorns Forever
card.text: Shuffle the discard pile into the deck. Search the deck for a Unicorn card and bring that card directly into your Stable. Each other player may DRAW a card. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Unicornucopia
card.text: DRAW cards until you reach your hand limit. Each other player may DRAW 2 cards.

card.name: Wishing Well
card.text: DISCARD a card, then DRAW 3 cards.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

card.name: Super Neigh
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile. This card cannot be Neigh'd.

card.name: Controlled Chaos
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, you may choose to either DESTROY a Unicorn card OR search the deck for a Unicorn card and add it to your hand.

card.name: Extra Life
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card.

card.name: Foresight
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of the deck. If you do, add one of them to your hand, then shuffle the other 2 back into the deck and skip your Draw phase.

card.name: Glass Half Full
card.text: Each time a Downgrade card enters your Stable, you may search for an Upgrade card and bring it directly into your Stable.

card.name: Imaginary Friendicorn
card.text: If you have a Baby Unicorn card in your Stable, you need 1 fewer Unicorn to win.

card.name: Retribution
card.text: Each time any other player destroys a Unicorn card in your Stable, you may DESTROY a Unicorn card that in that player's Stable.

card.name: Unicorn Adoption Agency
card.text: If you have two or more Basic Unicorn cards in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD a card. If you do, bring a Baby Unicorn card from the Nursery directly into your Stable.

card.name: Unicorn Mafia
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 2 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE or DESTROY a card.

card.name: Anti-Magic Bubble
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE all Downgrade cards. You cannot play Magic cards. If a Downgrade card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE this card.

card.name: Black Hole
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, SACRIFICE a Magical Unicorn card. Search the deck for a Basic Unicorn card and bring it directly into your Stable if there is one. Shuffle the deck.

card.name: Brain Freeze
card.text: You cannot play Instant cards.

card.name: Catastrophe
card.text: All of your Unicorns are considered Cats. Cards that affect Unicorn cards do not affect your Cats. Triggered effects of your Cats, do not trigger.

card.name: Greener Pastures
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, you may DISCARD 3 cards. If you do, SACRIFICE this card. If you don't, move a Unicorn card from your Stable to any other player's Stable.

card.name: Otter Devastation
card.text: All of your Unicorns are considered Otters. Cards that affect Unicorn cards do not affect your Otters.

card.name: Restricted Area
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE all Downgrade cards. You cannot play Magical Unicorn cards. If a Downgrade card enters your Stable, SACRIFICE this card.

card.name: Unicorn Abduction
card.text: If this card is in your Stable at the beginning of your turn, shuffle a Unicorn card from your Stable into the deck, then DRAW a card. If at any time you have no Unicorn cards in your Stable, SACRIFICE this card.

card.name: Sharing Is Caring
card.text: Choose a Unicorn from each player's Stable. Shuffle them together, then deal them out face down. Those unicorns come directly into play in the new players' Stables.

card.name: Neigh, Thank You
card.text: Play this card when any other player tries to play a card. Stop that player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile. Both you and that player may draw a card.

card.name: The Magical Pugicorn
card.text: When this card enters your Stable, each player must give a card from their hand to the player on their left.

card.name: Unicorns of the Apocalypse
card.text: SACRIFICE 4 Unicorn cards, then search the deck for 4 Unicorn cards and bring them directly into your Stable. Shuffle the deck.
